questions.question: わたし（＿）がくせいです。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:
～は - topic marker
がくせい - student
[topic] + は + [description]

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「わたしはがくせいです」 means "I am a student."

  • が - subject marker, but not used for introducing a topic
  • を - object marker
  • に - location/time marker
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is は.

  • が - subject marker, but not used for introducing a topic
  • を - object marker
  • に - location/time marker

questions.question: これは（＿）ですか？
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:
これは〇〇ですか？ - Is this 〇〇?
Use the noun directly.

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「これはいぬですか？」 means "Is this a dog?"

  • いぬを - object form, unnecessary here
  • いぬが - makes the sentence ungrammatical here
  • いぬの - possessive, means "dog's"
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is いぬ.

  • いぬを - object form, unnecessary here
  • いぬが - makes the sentence ungrammatical here
  • いぬの - possessive, means "dog's"

questions.question: おちゃを（＿）。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:
～を + verb - action on object
おちゃ - tea

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「おちゃをのみます」 means "I drink tea."

  • たべます - "eat", not used with tea
  • ききます - "listen", not suitable
  • みます - "see/watch"
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer
The correct answer is のみます.

  • たべます - "eat", not used with tea
  • ききます - "listen", not suitable
  • みます - "see/watch"
